title: Last Shot while Resurrecting
body:
So while I'm sure the rock monsters had a chance to finish me.

Jhin just pulls out his gun mid resurrection to kill me- and I am pretty sure that is not supposed to be a thing.

replies.body:
Not even death can restrain him from making the world beautiful.

Perfection knows no boundary.

(also yeah, im pretty sure this is a bug and not intended)
{{champion:202}} "My talent justifies all actions."
Yeah, this bug is also not tied to this patch, it's been a thing for some time already.
Not tied to Jhin only either, saw Jayce do it a while ago.
I think I saw Cait do it out of Bard's ult stasis. It was in Magikapr's League of Failures, although I'm not sure in which one.
Riot hello?
No fix. This is not game breaking. And Jhin is a poster boy. You get a 3 week suspension for speaking out against him.
You know what they say. Art is eternal. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
It isnt bug. Its ~~a feature ~~ART
Jhin is a riot favorite
{{champion:157}}

You can't just  "fix" {{champion:202}} P{{champion:202}} E{{champion:202}} R{{champion:202}} F{{champion:202}} E{{champion:202}} C{{champion:202}} T{{champion:202}} 
But have an upvote for hope.
And I thought Mordekaiser had the worst bugs.
It looks like his auto attack animation didn't cancel upon resurrection. Another bug to add to the list?

"Oh.. it seems that I have been defe-"

*suddenly shoots her*

"GOTTEM"
Yea this happen time to time, this bug haven't been fixed for years, it sometime happen with anivia egg too.
This is an issue with virtually every character. Triggering GA and Chronobreak does not interrupt cast-times, as death usually would. As another example, I've had Caitlyn fire her Q while "dead".
So that's why he neefs nerfs xD

I took jhin to a bar but he was in critical condition after his third shot. Poppy was already hammered, and Gragas couldn't make it because he signed up for the military thinking they had an excellent draft.
